text: wouldn´t each option other than 1 result either in inconsistency or confusion?

I don’t want to bias the answers folks give but, generally I think yes.

2. would be inconsistent in both UI and code.
3. may more defy expectations the developer has.

If we go with option 1 though the loading fields will start appearing in logo fields that did not previously show it. (As long as the developer did set `show_loading` to `true` in the field object. Which is what our developer documentation has)
" the loading fields will start appearing in logo fields that did not previously" - which is good because before people might be wondering how they are loaded, if its stated in the UI, its clear
I think the poll is backwards. Currently the loading options only show up when you choose to override the default logo. They do not currently show up when you use the default logo set in  settings.
Apologies I shouldn’t have written it in such a way that starting with “not”. That may also have confused things
